references.paper_title: Unsupervised label noise modeling and loss correction
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for modeling and correcting label noise, which is a crucial aspect of the research presented in the target paper.

references.paper_title: A closer look at memorization in deep networks
references.reason: This paper investigates memorization in deep networks, which is a significant concern when dealing with noisy labels, as addressed in the target paper.
This paper addresses the problem of noisy labels in regression tasks, which is the primary focus of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Co-teaching: Robust training of deep neural networks with extremely noisy labels
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel co-teaching method to improve the robustness of deep neural networks when trained on data with noisy labels, a relevant technique also used in the target paper.
This paper proposes Mixup, a data augmentation technique that improves model generalization, a related concept that the target paper explores in its approach.
